title: Spicy Tomato Soup
ingredients: ['1 large sweet chilli, halved and deseeded', '1 yellow pepper, halved and deseeded', '1 large onion, halved', '1 clove garlic', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 chicken or vegetable stock cube', '1 handful of fresh basil', '2 tsp dried oregano', '1 tsp sugar', 'freshly ground pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon tomato puree', '1 tin of plum tomatoes in tomato juice', 'salt to taste']
